summary: A graduate student (Nicholson) copes with a recent breakup by conducting interviews with various men.
cast: Julianne Nicholson|Ben Shenkman|Timothy Hutton|Michael Cerveris|Corey Stoll|Chris Messina|Max Minghella|Lou Taylor Pucci|Will Arnett|John Krasinski|Will Forte|Joey Slotnick|Clarke Peters|Dominic Cooper|Benjamin Gibbard|Bobby Cannavale|Christopher Meloni|Denis O'Hare|Josh Charles|Frankie Faison|Malcolm Goodwin|Rashida Jones|Marin Ireland|Lorri Bagley|Alain Van Beaux|Cher Cosenza|Lucy Gordon|Julie Lamb|Corinne Palermo
title: Breves entrevistas con hombres repulsivos
